name: widget
hint: Typescript: Register in a route config - appear across multiple routes

props.name: name
props.hint: Prefix with your teams name and use kebab-case, eg. wex-example-spa

props.name: cssScope
props.hint: Prefix with your teams name and a short version of the spa name eg. data-wex-es

props.name: channel
props.hint: A slack team alert channel eg. #wex-dev-alerts

props.name: spaMountPointId
props.hint: The id of the html element, you wish to mount the widget into

props.name: codeowner
props.hint: CODEOWNERS are automatically added for review
